import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import $ from 'jquery'; import ActivityLoader from 'react-loader-spinner'; const modalRoot=document.getElementById('portal_modal'); const Modal =(props)=>{ return ReactDOM.createPortal(
{(!props.loader && props.modalType!="two_auth") &&

OTP

{props.warning_msg}
} {(props.loader && props.modalType!="two_auth") &&

{props.loading_msg}

} {props.modalType=="two_auth" &&
{props.img_2fa=='' && }
{props.auth_err}
}
,modalRoot ) } export default Modal;
